mcq.statement: What was the main purpose of the referendum held in Pakistan on April 30, 2002?

options.a: To elect a new prime minister
options.c: To allow Pervez Musharraf to continue as president for five years

mcq.one_liner: The main purpose of the referendum held in Pakistan on April 30, 2002, was to decide if **Pervez Musharraf should continue as president for five years**.
